ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Digest Number 1024
ygData.msgSnippet: Must just be the Enchanters you ve run with.  I group with Enchanters all the time.  Did at all levels.  Recently was in a group with two of them! Certainly -
ygData.messageBody:
Must just be the Enchanters you've run with. I group with Enchanters all
the time. Did at all levels. Recently was in a group with two of them!

Certainly - it's a lot harder to pick your set of songs - but trust me -
when you get to 32 - groups love the "double-crack combo". Best way to keep
that Cleric ready to heal...

Slyde

-----Original Message-----
From: K. Bruce [mailto:lady_ark@...]
Sent: Wednesday, June 28, 2000 8:32 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Digest Number 1024



>what level are you? i don't think i was ever at a level where i didn't
want an
>enchanter in the group except when i was soloing thru level 5.


my first real partner and the person who i started playing because of was
great as a warrior. we did awesome. then we both started new chars bard/enc.
i nearly quit playing eq, lost him as a friend, and ya. what a horrible time
that was. i avoid them now, since following experiences with encs and i just
don't mix. imho, i think enc's have a certain personality type that just
don't mix with bards. hehe

lynnara starspinner
